name: Quarantine Time
description:
• Introduction

In a laboratory a virus has appeared. Your job is to stop it.  In the beginning you can choose where will the virus appear. The town is the easiest to manage, but if you are up for a challenge, try the metropolis.  Can you stop the virus before it infects everyone?

  • Investigation and quarantine

Click on people to get more information in the top-left corner. There you can send the either to investigation or to quarantine. You can only send 3 people to the investigation room. If the people has the virus he'll automatically go to quarantine. In the quarantine he'll be cured. If you send someone to quarantine who don't have the virus he'll be infected.
